LinkItem.internal_link_text: What’s New in Private Cloud with System Center 2012 R2 VMM
What’s New in Private Cloud with System Center 2012 R2 VMM
Creating a private cloud in VMM
Walkthrough: Creating private clouds with System Center 2012 SP1 VMM
Creating a private cloud in VMM
Walkthrough: Creating private clouds with System Center 2012 SP1 VMM
Configuring VM networks and gateways in VMM
Configuring VM networks and gateways in VMM
How to create storage classifications in VMM
How to create storage classifications in VMM

BlockContent.p: After you save the settings a job will be created and can be monitored on the **Jobs** tab. All Hyper-V host servers in the VMM source cloud will be configured for replication. Cloud settings can be modified on the **Configure** tab. If you want to modify the target location or target cloud you must remove the cloud configuration, and then reconfigure the cloud.
